document.full_text: government forces backed by snipers on rooftops tightened their grip on syria's third city on monday, rights groups said, after president bashar al-assad sent in tanks in a sharpening crackdown on protests against his rule.
document.title: assad tightens grip on syria's restive third city
lines_and_colors: government forces backed by snipers on rooftops tightened their grip on syria's third city on monday, rights groups said, after president bashar al-assad sent in tanks in a sharpening crackdown on protests against his rule.
